scripts.dev: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) && pnpm exec prisma generate && nodemon
scripts.build:prod: export $(cat .env.production | xargs) && pnpm exec prisma generate && tsc --outDir dist
scripts.migrate:dev: export $(cat .env.development | xargs) && pnpm exec prisma migrate dev && pnpm exec prisma generate
scripts.migrate:prod: export $(cat .env.production | xargs) && pnpm exec prisma migrate deploy && pnpm exec prisma generate
